pages.text: Dust pickers are an essential tool to finally get specific shards instead of random ones.$(br)They are used in conjunction with a shard picking table and some dust.

pages.name: Dust Picker
pages.text: The dust pickers are crafted using a Heavy Ingot, a Soulsteel Ingot and one of the shards.

To use a shard picking table, simply right click it with some mysterious dust to place it on the crystal bowl.$(br)Then grab a dust picker and find some shards that are hidden in the dust. You might not be able to find none, but keep trying.

When you have the shards you need, keep the dust pickers neatly organised in a Dust Picker Holder. Sneak Right click the dust picker holder to insert the dust picker in your hand.$(br2)When you need a dust picker back, simply right click on the holder to get one. Cycle through the dust pickers on the holder by repeatedly right clicking the holder with a dust picker.
